title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not appear as expected.
EB: Column icons should be visible when connecting to a Derby database in the Data Explorer view.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Generate a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to the Derby database:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the 'Edit Data Set' window, select 'Query'.
6. Perform additional relevant actions to observe the absence of column icons.
